info.name: GymBite Backend API v3.0.0 - Complete Collection
info.description:
Complete API collection for GymBite - AI-powered fitness management platform

**Features:**
- 48+ Endpoints across 11 modules
- Firebase Authentication
- Role-based Access Control (Client/Trainer/Admin)
- Push Notifications via FCM
- Real-time Analytics

**Base URLs:**
- Production: https://gymbite-backend.vercel.app/api
- Local: http://localhost:3000/api

**Version:** 3.0.0
**Last Updated:** October 21, 2025

request.description: Check if database connection is ready
Get trainer profile by user ID

body.raw:

  "userId": 1,

  "experience": 5,
  "bio": "Certified personal trainer with 5 years experience"
}
